Introducing **KanaLoud** – your new Japanese text-to-speech companion! 🇯🇵🎧

With KanaLoud, you can instantly convert Japanese text into spoken audio using two leading text-to-speech services: **ElevenLabs** and **MiniMax**. Whether you're learning Japanese or just prefer to listen rather than read, KanaLoud makes it a breeze to hear Japanese web content out loud! 💬🔊

### 🌟 **Key Features**:
1. **Choose Your Service**: Supports **ElevenLabs** and **MiniMax** for high-quality audio 🎙️
2. **Pick Your Voice**: Select from a variety of voice options – find the one that suits you best! 🎶
3. **Quick Setup**: Easy, intuitive interface so you can get started in no time ⏳
4. **Flexible Configuration**: Use one or both services based on your needs – it's up to you! ⚙️

**Download KanaLoud today and start listening!** 🌟
